amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Defense Environmental Cleanup account by $1,655,900,180; increase funding for the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $992,620,780; increase funding for the Science Activities account by $430,029,400; and increase funding for the Advanced Research Projects account by $233,250,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Defense Environmental Cleanup account by $1,655,900,180 and to increase funding for the Renewable Energy , Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $992,620,780; increase funding for the Science Activities account by $430,029,400; and increase funding for the Advanced Research Projects account by $233,250,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..
